name: Escape From Inferno
description: A angel named Lordrid is flying through her cloudy paradise, until she is kidnapped by a bunch of demons and sent to the bottom of Hell. Hoping to fight against the nefarious creatures, she finds a lost bow from the withered corpse of a former soldier. Combined with her ability to spawn arrows of light from thin air, Lordrid slays her fiends through distanced combat, while flying upward towards her home. Lordrid must rely on her impeccable archery skills in an effort to survive the gauntlets of demons awaiting her and escape Inferno.
